entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Broken localization after "Publish" from resources from the "Shared" library in the Blazor WASM client #56560
  • Consider replacing AddRouting with AddRoutingCore in AddConnections #56559
  • Issue restoring the project: Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk not found #56556
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #56554
  • Quarantine RazorViews_AreUpdatedOnChange and RazorPages_AreUpdatedOnChange #56553
  • Change wwwroot to Assets in Razor Class Library #56552
  • `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Internal.Http.HttpResponseHeaders` does not validate headers the same way as `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HeaderDictionary` does #56543
  • Blazor static SSR SupplyParameterFromForm has issue to bind a Dictionary value which is declared after a nullable property. #56542
  • Schema get duplicated for every request in open-api #56541
  • User is authenticated false, when using multiple cookie authentications #56540
  • `DatabaseDeveloperPageExceptionFilter` produces bizzare exception if model fails to initialize #56539
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #56538
  • Blazor WebAssembly Error: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'out') after Publishing #56537

Closed

  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #56555
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #56520
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56479
  • RemoteAuthenticatorView is failing when CustomAuthenticationStateProvider is registered for keycloak #56508
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #56536

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not close connection for http1.0 when client request connection keep-alive #56558
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Allow streams to get disposed while being transmitted to the browser #56557
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `34ad51b` #56547
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24351.1 #56546
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `34ad51b` #56545
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Fix comment typos in build props #56544
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Annotate SignalR server for native AOT #56460
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview7
  • Increase the default number of IO queues on larger machines #56501
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Simply SignalR Client IAsyncEnumerable usage #56561
    area-signalr
  • Set readOnly status for properties and support OpenApiServers #56470
    area-mvc
  • Always ref request body and response schemas and fix nested types #56513
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add overloads for problem and validation problem results that accept `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<,>>` #56368
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Use UtcNowParameterKey constant to replace usages of "UtcNow" in DatabaseOperations.cs #56442
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Avoid StringSegment conversions #56533
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use pattern matching #56532
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use char overloads to Join/Index strings #56531
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix typos #56530
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Amortise HTTP Result Content-Type arrays #56525
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Replace "instanceof" due to DOM realm mixin when Blazor is IFRAME-d #56367
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Add `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Predicate<Claim>` #56346
    community-contribution, area-security
